name: Riffenberg's Music Box
description:
A little musical project made by students for class with some fixes.

It is New York, 1940. Leonard Rifenberg, a popular jazz musician respected all over the country for his legendary compositions, that upon his death has only left behind, as his only inheritance, a safe locked with several mechanical devices that have prevented many from opening it and discovering what is inside.

A year has passed since Rifenberg’s death, and the safe’s mechanisms are still locked. The only thing discovered by those who tried to solve it is that the box is locked by a series of musical riddles.

You, as a young musical candidate, and the last to set his hands on this mysterious steel crate, have the goal to solve its riddle and discover the secret that Rifenberg left upon his death about his music.
